code.name: add_AIX_java_path.sh
code.code_content:
if [ $# -lt 1 ] then echo " " echo "Purpose: AIX add java8 path to PATH env" echo "USAGE: add_AIX_java_path.sh FILE_NAME" echo " " exit 1 fi
OSTYPE=$(uname)
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "AIX"* ]]; then cat << 'EOF' >> $1 export PATH=/usr/java8_64/bin:${PATH} EOF fi
